text: [Music]
hello I'm Ashley a technical customer
service associate here at the AWS office
in Cape Town today I'm going to show you
what to do if you have trouble signing
in or accessing your AWS account let's
get
started there are a few common reasons
why you may have trouble accessing your
AWS account
browser issues preventing signing in
incorrect or forgotten AWS
credentials account notification about
an issue like suspension or lost or
broken multiactor authentication device
let's go through how to resolve each of
these issues first browser issues if
your browser prevents you from signing
in clear your browser's cash and cookies
or use a different
browser next incorrect or forgotten
credentials to sign in as the root user
you must have the email address and
password associated with the account for
an AWS identity and access management
user use the credentials provided by
your
administrator if you can sign in but
can't access parts of the console your
permissions may be restricted to resolve
this contact your account administrator
directly to reset the root user or I am
user password follow the steps to
recover a lost or forgotten
password if you forgot the email for the
account or the email doesn't work check
out the troubleshooting steps
here for account issues such as
suspension or closure note that
suspended accounts can potentially be
reactivated also closed accounts under
90 days may be
reopened accounts closed over 90 days
can't be reopened you must create a new
AWS
account if you've lost or broken your
multiactor authentication device you
must remove it from the account
if none of these steps work then contact
the AWS support using the support
form here are a few other tips make sure
that you sign in using the correct AWS
account ID and
Alias and check that you don't have any
instance connection timeout issues
especially if you are trying to access
Amazon elastic Cloud compute instances
so now you know what to do if you are
having trouble signing in or accessing
your AWS
account thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Music]
